author: "Dayana Moncada"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(Lahman)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
dft<-Teams%>%
  filter(yearID==1980)%>%
  select(name,HR)%>%
  arrange(HR)
```

```{r}
ggplot()+
  geom_bar(data = dft, aes(x=name,y=HR),stat = "identity",color="white", fill="purple")+
  coord_flip() 
```

dft$name <- factor(dft$name,levels=dft$name)

```{r}
ggplot()+
  geom_bar(data = dft, aes(x=name,y=HR),stat = "identity",color="white", fill="purple")+
  coord_flip() 
```
